00056     public function Compile($format) {
00057         $data = '';
00058         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00059             $data .= chr(0x27).pack('xxx');
00060         } else {
00061             $data .= chr(0x0C).pack('xxx');
00062         }
00063         $data .= pack('V',1);
00064         $data .= pack('V',32).$this->moniker;
00065         $data .= pack('V',32).$this->moniker; //yeah, twice. Dunno why, CL are bonkers.
00066         $data .= pack('V',strlen($this->name)).$this->name;
00067         $data .= pack('VVVV',$this-gender,$this->genus,$this->species,count($this->events));
00068         foreach($this->events as $event) {
00069                 $data .= $event->Compile();
00070         }
00071         $data .= $this->unknown1;
00072         $data .= $this->unknown2;
00073         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00074             $data .= pack('V',$this->unknown3);
00075             $data .= pack('V',strlen($this->unknown4)).$this->unknown4;
00076         }
00077     }
00082     public function GuessFormat() {
00083         return (isset($this->unknown3))?GLST_FORMAT_DS:GLST_FORMAT_C3;
00084     }
00089     public function AddEvent(CreatureHistoryEvent $event) {
00090         $this->events[] = $event;
00091     }
00098     public function GetEvent($n) {
00099         return $this->events[$n];

00106         return sizeof($this->events);

00113     public function GetEventsByType($type) {
00114         $matchingEvents = array();
00115         foreach($this->events as $event) {
00116             if($event->GetEventType() == $type) {
00117                 $matchingEvents[] = $event;
00118             }
00119         }
00120         return $matchingEvents;
